dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hey, I've been playing this game for hours. Can you help me with this level?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Sure, what level are you on?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I'm stuck on Level 5. It's really challenging!

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Don't worry, I can give you some tips to beat that level.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: That would be awesome! What should I do?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: First, try to collect all the power-ups to increase your abilities.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Then, strategically use them to overcome the obstacles and defeat the enemies.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Thanks for the advice! I'll give it a try.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: You're welcome! Good luck and have fun playing!
